attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hindu Samaj, RSS do not deny the existence of separate religion and separate beliefs. Hindu Samaj is a commonwealth of many religions. It includes idol worshippers as well as those that are against idol worship. It includes those who accept the authority of the Vedas as well as those who do not. They are all included in the wider Hindu conceptualization.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
